```{r setup}
library(dists)
library(tidyverse)
data(toy_data1)
```

```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
out <- paste0("$$ d_{\\text{euc}}({\\bf v}, {\\bf w}) = \\sqrt{\\sum_{i=1}^n (v_i-w_i)^2}$$")
cat(out)
```

```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
v <- 1
w <- 3
out <- c("$$ d_{\\text{euc}}(", v, ", ", w, ") = ")
for(i in 1:ncol(toy_data1)) {
  v <- toy_data1 %>% slice(i) %>% pull(V1)
  w <- toy_data1 %>% slice(i) %>% pull(V2)
  out <- append(out, c("(",v,"-",w,")^2"))
  if(i != ncol(toy_data1)) # check so it is no added in last pair
    out <- append(out, c(" + "))
}
out <- append(out,"$$")
cat(out)
```
